basic_info.description: üëã I'm Ibrahim Husein Salama, a seasoned Web and Mobile App Developer with over seven years of expertise in React Native, Flutter, and more. My experience spans industries, from CRM and telehealth to blockchain applications. Let's build something amazing together. ‚ù§Ô∏è

projects.title: IRIS CRM
projects.description: A robust CRM application for ISOs in the payments industry. Integrated real-time lead management, Twilio-powered phone systems, Google Maps, and e-signatures. Enhanced state management with Redux-Saga and optimized API calls with GraphQL.

projects.title: Beem
projects.description: An innovative mobile app featuring blockchain and cryptocurrency functionalities. Integrated Web3, Agora for video conferencing, AWS, and Stripe payments.

projects.title: Ringdoc
projects.description: A telehealth app for booking appointments and doctor consultations. Available on web, Google Play, and the App Store.

projects.title: Benna Academy
projects.description: An educational app offering live courses and encrypted videos focused on civil engineering. Available on web, Google Play, and the App Store.

projects.title: YMK Restaurant Delivery App
projects.description: A comprehensive restaurant delivery app built with React Native. Features include real-time order tracking, dynamic menus, user-friendly UI, and admin dashboard integration for restaurant owners.

experience.title: Android & iOS Native Developer
experience.description: Started learning native mobile development in 2016, focusing on Android with Java/Kotlin and iOS with Swift/Objective-C. Built foundational knowledge in mobile app development, setting the stage for future cross-platform expertise.
